summary: Antonio and his son Pietro, alone in Milan to face cancer. Jaber, just fifteen, in Italy with a group of fellow countrymen. They will meet each others in the hospital. The disease is the pretext for a meeting.
cast: Filippo Timi|Jaouher Brahim Ben Fredj|Dragos Costantin Toma|Gabriel De Glaudi|Tijey De Glaudi|Naim Chalbi|El Farouk Abd Alla|Ivan Brusa|Alessandro Carnevale Pellino
title: I corpi estranei
